aboutUs.aboutUsText: SBI Life is one of the leading private Life Insurance companies in India. We are a joint venture between India’s largest bank State Bank of India and the leading global insurance company BNP Paribas Cardif.State Bank Group has an unrivalled strength of over 23,000 branches across the country, making it the largest Banking group in India. With 198 foreign offices in 37 countries, SBI is truly an Indian multinational.It also features in the Fortune Global 500 list of the world’s biggest corporations.BNP Paribas Cardif is the Life and Property & Casualty insurance arm of BNP Paribas, one of the strongest banks in the world. With presence in more than 70 countries, the BNP Paribas Group ranks highly in Retail Banking, Investment Solutions and Corporate & Investment Banking.BNP Paribas Cardif is one of the world leaders in creditor insurance, and its life and non-life insurance units have received an A rating from Standard & Poor’s.

goalList.goalDesc: Give your loved ones a wholesome protection by estimating the life insurance cover you will need.
Medical costs are on a rise. Ensure that you and your family are adequately protected by estimating the health cover your family will need.
Education expenses may rise faster than inflation, so work out your investments wisely for yourself and your child with our smart education planner.
Whether you are planning for your dream wedding or your child’s, our wedding planner will help you plan your investments to make that dream wedding come true.
Own your dream home by planning and investing wisely with our home planner.
Invest wisely and live your dream with our smart car planner so you can buy your favourite car.
Continue living life to the fullest, post your retirement, save and invest wisely with our retirement planner.
Whether you are planning to expand your business or go on a world tour with your family, our custom planner will help you plan your investments wisely for your dreams to come true.

familyProtection.adbPopup: The Medical expenses and permanent loss of income from an accidental death of the breadwinner can be emotionally and financially distressing for the family. Here the accidental death benefit rider can prove helpful. In case of death the nominee receives the original sum assured plus additional rider amount.
familyProtection.tpdPopup: A Total and permanent disability rider can be beneficial in cases where the insured person suffers some kind of total and permanent disability that would hinder his/her ability to work thereby causing loss of regular income. In such cases the insured person gets a sum assured as per the rider.

healthInsuranceGoal.indemnityTxt: An indemnity-based plan reimburses the policyholder the cost of medical expenses if diagnosed with any of the critical illness. These plans will reimburse the policyholder with the amount incurred as expenses during a hospitalization stay up to the sum insured.
healthInsuranceGoal.fixedText: A fixed benefit plan is one where a fixed amount of funds is paid out to cover expenses for a predetermined illness or condition that has been insured. The fixed benefit plan can be beneficial as it provides an additional source of funds during a pre-insured critical illness.

toolsListing.desc: Find out how you can chart out a secure financial future of your family
Plan for a happy retirement and know how to build a retirement corpus with our NPS calculator.
Plan for your daughter’s future and save wisely with our Sukanya Samridhi Yojana calculator.
Know how to grow your money in safe and convenient way with our fixed deposit calculator.
Build savings the systematic monthly investment and earn high returns with SIP calculator.
Plan the EMI you can pay each month for home, personal or car loans with our EMI calculator.
Know how much loan you need for your dream home with our home loan eligibility calculator.
Plan for a happy retirement and experience the magic of compounding with our calculator.
Know where to invest your money as per your existing assets with our networth calculator.
Estimate the maturity amount of your PPF for retirement with our PPF calculator
Know how much you need to save with our calculator to become a Crorepati yourself!
Quit Smoking today and save your health and money instead!
Reduce number of times you eat out to save money and health!

infoPopup.title: Rate of Inflation
infoPopup.desc: Rate of inflation is rise in the price of goods and services measured in percentage over a period of time.

infoPopup.title: Increasing Saving Rate
infoPopup.desc: Increasing savings rate means increase in savings by a certain percentage on annual basis.

infoPopup.title: Duration This is the loan Tenure
infoPopup.desc: Duration of loan is the period from when the loan has been sanctioned to the closure of the loan.

infoPopup.title: Expected Rate of return
infoPopup.desc: Expected rate of return are the returns that an individual anticipates on investment.

infoPopup.title: FD Interest Rate
infoPopup.desc: FD interest rate is the percent of principal amount given to you by your bank at pre-defined intervals.

infoPopup.title: Loan Interest Rate
infoPopup.desc: Interest rate is the amount charged and expressed as percentage of principle by the lender.

TermsConditionHtml.value: These Terms and Conditions read together with the Privacy Policy of this Application shall constitute a legally binding agreement between you and the Company regarding your use of the Application and any services offered by the Company ('the Service'). In the event of any inconsistency between the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy, the Terms and Conditions supersede the Privacy Policy. Any user of the Application is deemed to have agreed to the present Terms and Conditions and has entered into a legally binding contract with the Company. 'User' or 'You' means any person who access or avail this Application of the Company for the purpose of hosting, publishing, sharing, transacting, displaying or uploading information or views and includes other persons jointly participating in using the Application of the Company. You understand and agree that you are using this Application entirely at your risk and SBI LIFE Insurance Company Ltd shall not be responsible for the consequences of any action taken by you while using this Application. This Application is provided to you by SBI Life free of cost as a service gesture and it is entirely your sole discretion as to whether you will use this application or not or whether you will rely on the guidance or suggestions provided by the Application. By accessing the Application or service and/or by clicking 'I agree', you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and any amendment thereof.

This Application provides articles, fact cards and tips to help user better plan their finances and investments for various important goals like Education, marriage, buying a car, Buying a Home and retirement. There will also be content covering general welfare and insurance. There will also be occasional news related articles. There will not be any articles related to any of the products of SBI Life Insurance Co Ltd or any other financial products in the market.

Apart from the content there will also be calculators that will help users calculate the maturity value of investments in various avenues. There is a separate goal section where user can plan for achieving various target amounts for different goals and the application will help them by giving suggestions like monthly savings required and the assets where user may wish to invest basis the risk assessment results of user. Suggestions are only limited to asset classes(equity, debt, small saving schemes etc) and no actual financial products will be suggested or mentioned in any way.)

The information, material, advices, suggestions, illustrations notifications, circulars etc. are collectively stated 'the content' in this applicaton. If the said content contains any mistakes, omissions, inaccuracies and typographical errors, etc. SBI Life assumes no responsibility thereof.

SBI Life makes no warranty or representation regarding any content provided through this application and disclaims its liabilities in respect thereof. Any action on your part on the basis of the said content is at your own risk and responsibility.

SBI Life reserves its right to correct any part of the said content at any time as and when required at its sole discretion. The content of this application shall not be displayed or printed in any form in part or whole without the prior written approval of SBI Life. SBI LIFE may, at its sole discretion, withdraw this Application at any time without any notice to the Public whatsoever.

E-mail messages sent to SBI Life over the Internet cannot be guaranteed to be completely secure. The integrity of such messages cannot be guaranteed on the Internet and SBI Life will not be responsible for any damages incurred by users due to messages sent or received by them to and from SBI Life.

SBI Life does not send emails from other than domain names - sbilife.co.in & sbi-life.com. Please do not respond to any mails other than email IDs with this domain name as same may be fraudulent/phishing emails.

You hereby represent and warrant to the Company that you have completed at least eighteen (18) years of age or above and are capable of entering, performing and adhering to these Terms and Conditions and that you agree to be bound by the Terms and Conditions. While individuals under the age of 18 may utilize the service of the Application, they shall do so only with the involvement & guidance of their parents and / or legal guardians, under such parent /legal guardian's registered account. In case of a corporation, trust, association of persons or a firm, you must be authorised to agree to the Terms and Conditions and to access, use and avail of the Application. If you do not qualify, please do not access or use the Application. This Application is intended exclusively for the use of Resident Indians, Non-Resident Indians, Persons of Indian Origin. Citizens and residents of countries other than India (collectively, 'non-residents') shall access, use and avail of the Application only to the extent the domestic laws of India and such countries of their residence permit them to access, use and avail of the Application. All non-residents understand that by accessing, using and availing of the Application, they may be violating the local laws in India and/or such countries. You agree that it will be your responsibility to check yourself as to whether you can use this Application  You agree that you will be solely and absolutely liable for any liability incurred by you in India or elsewhere and shall in this regard indemnify SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD and keep indemnified SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD against any liability incurred by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD in this regard. Nothing in the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application shall be considered as a solicitation to buy or an offer to sell a security, or any product or service, to any person in any jurisdiction where such solicitation, offer, purchase or sale would be unlawful under the laws of that jurisdiction.

By agreeing to the Terms & Conditions, the User agrees:
to confirm that the details provided by the User(s) are true and correct.

You shall not - -

  • Restrict or inhibit any other person from accessing, using and enjoying the Application;
  • Use the Application for any purpose that is unlawful in any jurisdiction or not permitted by the Terms and Conditions;
  • modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, publish, licence, create derivative works from, transfer or sell any information, designs, logos, trademarks, software, facilities, products or services obtained on or through the Application, except as permitted by the copyright owner or other right holder thereof;
  • post, transmit and receive any unlawful, fraudulent, libellous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, profane, threatening, abusive, hateful, offensive, or otherwise objectionable information or statement of any kind including, without limitation, any information or statement constituting or encouraging conduct that would constitute sedition, a criminal offence, give rise to civil liability, or otherwise violate any local, state, national, foreign or other law;
  • post or transmit any advertisements, solicitations, chain letters, pyramid schemes, investment opportunities or schemes or other unsolicited commercial communication (except as otherwise expressly permitted by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD) or engage in spamming or flooding;
  • post, transmit any spam mails, information or software which contains a virus, Trojan horse, worm or other harmful component; post, publish, transmit, reproduce, distribute or in any way exploit any information, software or other material obtained from or through the Application for commercial purposes ();
  • upload, post, publish, transmit, reproduce or distribute in any way, information, software or other material obtained on or through the Application which is protected by copyright or other proprietary right, or derivative works with respect thereto, except as permitted by the copyright owner or other right holder thereof;
  • upload, post, publish, reproduce, transmit or distribute in any way any component of the Application itself or derivative works with respect thereto, except as permitted by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD or the copyright owner or other right holder thereof, the Application being copyrighted under the relevant laws;
  • Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any of the software available on the Application.
  • You will not make any attempt to hack into the Application or otherwise attempt to subvert any firewall or other security measure of the Application and if you become aware of any shortcoming in the security on the Application you shall forthwith inform SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD of the same in writing. If the Application contains bulletin boards, chat rooms, access to mailing lists or other message or communication facilities (collectively, 'Forums'), you agree to use the Forums only to send and receive messages and material that are proper and related to the particular Forum. You shall use any software provided on, by or through the Application only for the purposes for which it has been provided to you and for no other purpose. 

You shall not host, display, upload, modify, publish, transmit, update or share any information on the Application, that:

  1. belongs to another person and to which you do not have any right to;
  2. is grossly harmful, harassing, blasphemous defamatory, obscene, pornographic, paedophilic, libellous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically objectionable, disparaging, relating or encouraging money laundering or gambling, or otherwise unlawful in any manner whatever;
  3. harm minors in any way;
  4. infringes any patent, trademark, copyright or other proprietary rights;
  5. violates any law for the time being in force;
  6. deceives or misleads the addressee about the origin of such messages or communicates any information which is grossly offensive or menacing in nature;
  7. impersonate another person;
  8. contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer resource;
  9. threatens the unity, integrity, defence, security or sovereignty of India, friendly relations with foreign states, or public order or causes incitement to the commission of any cognisable offence or prevents investigation of any offence or is insulting any other nation.

Any content and or comment uploaded by you, shall be subject to relevant Indian laws and may be disabled, or and may be subject to investigation under appropriate laws. Furthermore, if you are found to be in non-compliance with the laws and regulations, these terms, or the privacy policy of the Application, the Company shall have the right to immediately terminate/block your access and usage of the Application and the Company shall have the right to immediately remove any non-compliant Content and/or comment, uploaded by you and shall further have the right to take recourse to such remedies as would be available to the Company under the applicable laws.

value: This Application is not intended to provide any tax, legal, insurance or investment advice, and nothing on the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application should be construed as a recommendation, by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD or any third party, to acquire or dispose of any investment or security, or to engage in any investment transaction. Except as otherwise specified, you alone are solely responsible for determining whether any investment, security or any other product or service, is appropriate or suitable for you based on your investment objectives and personal and financial situation. You should consult a legal or tax professional regarding your specific legal or tax queries. Access and use of the Application is entirely at your own risk. The Application, including any content or information on it, any related or linked site, products and services displayed, provided, availed of, licensed or purchased on, through or via the Application are provided 'as is,' without any representation or warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including without limitation, any representation or warranty for accuracy, continuity, uninterrupted access, timeliness, sequence, quality, performance, fitness for any particular purpose or completeness. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall not be responsible for any unauthorised interception of e-mail to or from you or SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD. To the extent possible, the disclaimers, limitations on liability and indemnities available to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD under the Terms and Conditions shall mutates mutandis extend and be available also to the Alliance Partners and Service Providers and its/ their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, successors, assigns, consultants, sponsors, affiliates, content providers and every one involved in creating, producing, delivering or managing the Application (or any part thereof). However, this clause shall not protect the aforesaid Persons or extend to their obligations and liability to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD or SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD's claims against them. A possibility exists that the Application could include inaccuracies or errors. Additionally, a possibility exists that unauthorised additions, deletions or alterations could be made by third parties to the Application. Although SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD attempts to ensure the integrity of the Application, they make no guarantee whatsoever as to its sequence, timeliness, completeness, correctness or accuracy. In the event that such an inaccuracy or incompleteness arises, please inform SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD so that it can be corrected. Links from the Application clicking on certain portions or links within the Application might take you to other applications without any intimation or indication of doing or having done so. The linked applications are not under the control of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD assumes no responsibility whatsoever for such other applications whether as to content, availability, performance or otherwise. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD also does not represent or warrant that these links shall operate satisfactorily. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD provides these links only as a convenience and links to external web sites do not constitute an endorsement by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD of such other sites, the sponsors of such sites or the content, products, advertising or other materials presented on or by such sites. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the access or use of such other applications or reliance on or availing of any content, goods or services available on such other sites. The links on the Application may take you to other sites or to other locations within the Application where the trading of securities is possible. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall not be responsible or liable with regard to any trading which may be conducted on such linked trading sites, non-SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD web sites, and any other web site which may be linked to or from the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application. For informational or educational purposes, or as a convenience to the users, the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application may provide referrals to third party content or links to third party applications, including companies that have a relationship with SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD. Our decision to provide referral information to a third party or to pass on an offer made by a third party or to provide a link from SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application to a third party application shall not be construed as an endorsement of the third party products, services, content, tools and information. You will use third-party content at your own risk. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD is not responsible for any third party, their products or services their application, or any content made available through such third party sites, nor do we make any warranties or representations, express or implied, regarding third party content on any third party sites, and shall have no liability in relation to any of the foregoing. You shall agree to all the terms and conditions, disclaimers clauses and be liable to Copyright Owners of the hyper links appearing in the Application which is independent in itself and not connected. You shall further indemnify and keep indemnified SBI LIFE, its employees, directors, representatives and keep them harmless from any dispute(s) that may arise due to a violation/breach (s) of the Terms and Conditions of such hyper link(s) by you. You will be solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the account that you create on the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application.

TermsConditionHtml.key: Authority to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD
TermsConditionHtml.value: You irrevocably and unconditionally authorise SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD to access all information relating to you (including personal information and information relating to access and use of the Application by you and the transactions entered into by you). Subject to the Privacy Policy, all information submitted on or via the Application shall be deemed to be and remain the property of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD and the Partners; and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD, the Affiliate Partners shall be free to use, for any purpose, any ideas, concepts, know-how or techniques contained in any information you may provide to or through the Application. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD, the Partners shall not be subject to any obligations of confidentiality regarding submitted information except as otherwise expressly agreed by it directly with you. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall be deemed to acquire from you a non-exclusive, world-wide, perceptual, irrevocable, royalty free licence to use, adapt, reproduce, modify, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, perform or display any ideas, concepts, know-how or techniques contained in any information provided by you to or through the Application.

The Terms and Conditions and your use of or access to the Application are not intended to create an agency, partnership, joint-venture or employer-employee relationship between you and the Application, SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD and any Partner.

SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD has no obligation to monitor the functioning of the Application. However, you acknowledge and agree that SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD has the right to monitor the functioning of the Application electronically or otherwise from time to time and to disclose any information as necessary or appropriate to satisfy any law, regulation or other governmental request, to operate the Application properly or to protect itself or its Service Providers, Alliance Partners, Visitors, Users. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD will not intentionally monitor or disclose any private electronic-mail message to any third party unless required by law. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD reserves the right to refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, that, in its sole discretion, are unacceptable, undesirable, inappropriate or in violation of the Terms and Conditions.

You agree to defend, indemnify and hold SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD, its directors, officers, employees, Affiliates Partners, and Content harmless from any and all claims, liabilities, damages, costs, expenses and proceedings, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising in any way from your use of the Application or the placement or transmission of any message, information, software or other materials through the Application by you or users of your ID and password or related to any violation of the Terms and Conditions by you or users of your of your ID and password, and any claims dispute or differences between you and any supplier.

You acknowledge and agree that SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may, without notice, suspend or terminate your ID, password or account or deny you access to all or part of the Application without prior notice if you engage in any conduct or activities that SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD in its sole discretion believes violate any of the Terms and Conditions, violate the rights of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD, or is otherwise inappropriate for continued access, or IF SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD learns of your death, bankruptcy or lack of legal capacity or of circumstances which impact your credit worthiness (which shall be determined at the sole discretion of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD) or for any other reason which SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD thinks fit and proper. You acknowledge and agree that SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may in its sole discretion deny you access through SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD to any materials stored on the Internet, or to access third party services, merchandise or information on the Internet through the Application, and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall have no responsibility to notify you or third-party providers of facilities, services, merchandise or information nor any responsibility for any consequences resulting from lack of notification.

We will only share non-public personal information with third parties in the limited circumstances permitted under law including situations where we need to share information with entities who work on behalf of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD to service or maintain your account or process transactions as requested by you, when the disclosure is made to a party representing you, or when such information is required by law including inter alia in response to a legal process. Further, SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD will ensure that any third parties assisting it in marketing its products, are under contractual obligations to protect the confidentiality of information of the users of the SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD Application, and to use it only to provide the services to the extent as required under the agreement with SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD.

The Application, the Terms and Conditions, all transactions entered into on or through the Application and the relationship between you and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India and no other nation, without regard to the laws relating to conflicts of law. You and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD agree that all claims, differences and disputes arising under or in connection with or pursuant to the Application, the Terms and Conditions, any transactions entered into on or through the Application or the relationship between you and SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts located in the city of New Delhi, India and you hereby accede to and accept the jurisdiction of such courts. Provided that, notwithstanding what is stated above, if SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD so thinks fit SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may institute proceedings against you in any other court or tribunal having jurisdiction. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD accepts no liability whatsoever, direct or indirect for non-compliance with the laws of any country other than that of India. The mere fact that the Application can be accessed or used or any facility can be availed of in a country other than India would not mean that the laws of such country would be applicable.

The failure or delay of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD to exercise or enforce any right or provision of the Terms and Conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. No waiver on the part of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall be valid unless it is in writing signed by or on behalf of SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD. A waiver of any right or provision by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD on a particular occasion shall not prevent SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD from enforcing such right or provision on a subsequent occasion.

If any provision of the Terms and Conditions shall be held to be invalid or unenforceable by reason of any law or any rule, order, judgment, decree, award or decision of any court, tribunal or regulatory or self-regulatory agency or body, such invalidity or unenforceability shall attach only to such provision or condition,. The validity of the remaining provisions and conditions shall not be affected thereby and these Terms and Conditions shall be carried out as if any such invalid or unenforceable provision or condition was not contained herein.

Notwithstanding any statute or law to the contrary, but to the extent permitted by law, any claim or cause of action arising out of or related to access or use of the Application or the Terms and Conditions must be filed within three (3) months after such claim or cause of action arose failing which it shall be forever barred.

SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may give notice to you by e-mail, letter, telephone or any other means as SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may deem fit to the address last given by you. Notices under the Terms and Conditions may be given to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD by you in writing by delivering them by hand or by sending them by post to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD's address mentioned on the Application. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may, but shall not be bound to, act upon notices and instructions given by you to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD by e-mail, letter, telephone or any other means as SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may deem fit. In addition, SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may (but shall not be bound to) also publish notices of general nature, which are applicable to all users in a newspaper circulating in India or on its Application. Such notices will have the same effect as a notice served individually to each user (including you). Documents which may be sent by electronic communication between the parties may be in the form of an electronic mail, an electronic mail attachment, or in the form of an available download from the Application. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall be deemed to have duly communicated and delivered any communication or document to you if such communication or document is sent via electronic mail (e-mail) to the e-mail address provided by you to SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall also be entitled to act on the basis of any instructions received or purported to be received by SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD from you by e-mail or other electronic means or via the internet. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD shall also be entitled (but not bound) to act upon fax instructions and communications.

The clause headings in the Terms and Conditions are only for convenience and do not affect the meaning of any provision and shall not be taken into account in interpreting or limiting the scope of the provisions of the Terms and the Conditions. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may sub-contract or employ agents to carry out any functions or services relating to the Application or any of its obligations under the Terms and Conditions. SBI LIFE INSURANCE CO LTD may from time to time send by e-mail or otherwise, information relating to products and services offered by it or the Partners or any other entities, general information related to financial and other services, advertisements of various products and services etc. to you. You must at your own cost: (a) provide for your own access to the World Wide Web and pay any service fees, telephone charges and online service usage associated with such access, and (b) provide all equipment necessary for you to make such connection to the World Wide Web, including a computer and modem. The content presented at the Application may vary depending upon your browser limitations.

Redressal Mechanism: Any complaints, abuse or concerns with regards to content and or comment or breach of these terms shall be immediately informed by e-mail to paisagenie@sbilife.co.in Provide the following information in your complaint:

  1. Identification of the information provided by you.
  2. Clear statement as to whether the information is personal information or sensitive personal information.
  3. Your telephone number or e-mail address.
  4. A statement that you have a good-faith belief that the information has been processed incorrectly or disclosed without authorization, as the case may be.
  5. A statement, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notice is accurate, and that the information being complained about belongs to you.

incomeDashboard.assignSavingsTo: Assign savings to house goals, car goals, etc.
incomeDashboard.selectYourLimit: Select your desired limit for spending
incomeDashboard.inputMonthlySpendingLimit: Enter monthly spending limit for categories
incomeDashboard.gotMoreLifeGoals: Got more life goals to add
incomeDashboard.yourCurrentSavingsCanBe: Your current savings can be used to plan for your future Goals
incomeDashboard.uncategorisedSpends: Uncategorised spends waiting to be categorised.
incomeDashboard.doYouWishToLook: Do you wish to take a look at them?
incomeDashboard.itSeemsLike: It seems like your spends in
incomeDashboard.doYouWantToReset: Do you want to reset budget for
incomeDashboard.totalBudgetSet: Total budget set for the month:

savings.haveMoreFinancialGoals: Have more Life Goals to Add?

incomeApproximation.inputMonthlySpends: Input monthly spending limit for categories

addExpenses.doYouWantToDelete: Do you want to delete this spend?

report.spendsThatCanBeReduced: Spends that can be reduced (from total income)
report.manageSpendsToImprove: Manage spends to improve your future savings
report.taxIsDisplayedOnly: Tax is displayed only basis the salary provided and the applicable tax bracket. Actual tax to be paid may vary considering factors such investments in tax saving instruments, home loan etc.
report.spendsCanBe: Spends can be analyzed as required, semi optional and optional spends. This helps in understanding the spends which can be controlled, if need be.
report.impactOfExpense: Impact of Expense control on Savings in future
report.thisExplainthe: This explains the proportions by which your savings may increase if the optional spends are controlled. Any reduction in controllable expenses would help increase the savings rate.
report.thisRatioShows: This ratio shows what percentage of earnings that is actually at your disposal. It is calculated after deducting EMIs from the savings rate. It does not consider one-time expenses that are not regular in nature.
report.incomeExpenseReportIs: Income Expense report is shown for the number of month’s expense is being captured or input. The report considers data maximum for duration of 12 months.

surveyQuiz.surveyComplete: We truly value your opinion provided in the Survey.
